name: UserLogonHistory
author: TheHive Development Team
description: Retrieves user logon history from a REST API endpoint. Provides authentication activity including timestamps, IP addresses, locations, and authentication status for security analysis and incident response.

configurationItems.name: api_url
configurationItems.description: Full URL of the REST API endpoint for retrieving logon history. This should be the complete URL including protocol (e.g., https://api.example.com/v1/users/logon-history)

configurationItems.name: api_key
configurationItems.description: API key or bearer token for authentication (optional). If provided, will be sent as 'Authorization: Bearer {token}' header

configurationItems.name: verify_ssl
configurationItems.description: Verify SSL certificates for HTTPS requests
